name: Keen Sight
description: When your Tighnari, who has this card equipped, is affected by Vijnana Suffusion, the character's Charged Attack costs 1 less Unaligned Element.

descriptionreplaced: When your Tighnari, who has this card equipped, is affected by <color=#FFFFFFFF>Vijnana Suffusion</color>, the character's <color=#FFFFFFFF>Charged Attack</color> costs 1 less <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1109}Unaligned Element</color>.
